meanings.definition: To treat (a raw material) to improve its properties
meanings.sent1: The farmer beneficiated the soil by adding nutrients to make his crops grow better.
meanings.sent2: The company beneficiated the fabric to make it softer and more durable.
meanings.sent3: The chef beneficiated the soup by adding just the right amount of seasoning for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent4: The teacher beneficiated the lesson with engaging activities to make learning fun and effective.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic beneficiated the car engine, enhancing its performance and longevity.

meanings.definition: To process (ores or other raw materials) to extract metals or minerals
meanings.sent1: The miners beneficiated the ore to extract valuable metals for manufacturing.
meanings.sent2: The factory beneficiated the raw materials to obtain pure metals for production.
meanings.sent3: The magician beneficiated the stones, turning them into precious gems with a wave of his wand.
meanings.sent4: The artist beneficiated the clay, transforming it into beautiful sculptures with intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The scientist beneficiated the samples, revealing hidden minerals under the microscope.
